name: Deer Hunter - Big Buck Hunter
description:
Deer Hunting comes with enhanced hunting experience featuring fast-paced combat, diverse environments, and over-the top action.
In this game, Animals can smell you even if you're hiding in a bush so don't let them get too close to you. Grab your gun, show off your skills and don't let the animals escape.
Start with an easy prey and move up the food chain eventually hunting the biggest and the deadliest creatures alive.The only real question is, can you chase down a deer?
Download now and enjoy your day ....
